ModMetaData.name: Arcane Technology Reborn
ModMetaData.author: Ferris, Dametri, GwinnBleidd
ModMetaData.description:
A Rewritten version of arcane technology
Restrict weapon and armor usage until the technology has been researched! We recommend using this together with Tech Advancing Reborn and Semi Random Research for best results!
New Features: - Configurable Tech level per weapon/armor - Much much better identifier for "Clothing" technology to avoid cosmetic items
Updated Compatability: - Fixed patches for SimpleSidearms - Fixed patches for ArmorRacks equipment/weapons If you want another mod to be added to the patch list for avoiding equipment feel free to dm me or add a comment I will aim to maintain this!
Notes: - Package ID will not be changed, im keeping with the original to allow compatability with old patches
Original mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2554469600
